alert.note: Alert for East Bay Hills; East Bay Interior Valleys; Eastern Santa Clara Hills; North Bay Interior Mountains (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued May 20 at 5:18AM PDT until May 20 at 2:00PM PDT by NWS Monterey
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 2 PM PDT THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...In the valleys: Northerly winds 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 45 mph expected. In the higher terrain: North winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. Gusts greater than 50 mph possible in the highest peaks. * WHERE...North Bay Interior Mountains, Eastern Santa Clara Hills, East Bay Hills and East Bay Interior Valleys. * WHEN...Until 2 PM PDT this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...These strong and gusty winds will result in near-critical fire weather conditions.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: East Bay Hills; East Bay Interior Valleys; Eastern Santa Clara Hills; North Bay Interior Mountains
